name: Double Sided Luxe Tan Applicator Mitt
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Remove the mitt from the plastic outer wrap, put onto your hand, and add your tanning product..-With long sweeping motions, work the product into your skin..-To clean, soak in soapy water, rinse, and let dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Stays soft, and easy to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a couple different tan applicator mitts, some of which the lining inside detaches pretty quickly. Most mitts also don't stay soft; they get hard spots - I use a mild hand soap (NOT anti-bacterial) on my mitts and wash very thoroughly - and this one didn't, which was a very pleasant surprise. It doesn't retain any soap/tanning mousse odor. I use Bali Body's tanning mousse and also tried their tanning mitt, and was not impressed; this St. Tropez one is almost half the price of the Bali Body one, and this is WAY more durable.  I don't really care for the thumb space that a lot of mitts have,  so I don't care that this one doesn't have one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Works great for applying the product however hand washing it didnu2019t really didnu2019t everything out so I decided to try throwing it in the washer anyways. Ended up getting destroyed in the washer which I kinda seem coming. I wish this was machine washable and I would give 5 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Love it but itu2019s too small!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very apprehensive to purchase this mitt. Although the original was poor quality I was used to it and it did the job even though it required frequent replacements. I had stopped using tanning products for over a year but recently decided to start again. That being said I went to purchase a new mitt only to discover a new mitt, and the original was not being sold any longer. I purchased this new mitt and I absolutely love it. My tan went on smoother than ever and used way less product which was great. I did take off one star as I find the mitt is very small. I have gel extension nails and a fairly small hand and could hardly get my hand in side. Seems like it was made for a small child. Also the material on the inside was making my hands sweaty which was uncomfortable. I assume this new material on the inside is to prevent product seeping through and making your palms orange- which i can appreciate. I did find the inside removed any product that was applied to the back of my hand so Iu2019ve yet do think up a way to tan the back of my hands without the inside of the mitt removing it when changing hands!  Overall, I love the mitt and am so happy I purchase it!!

reviews.review_text: This mitt makes applying my tan sooo much easier and quicker! I've only used normal mitts before (made of some sort of foam). This material is a soft, almost fuzzy material. My tan goes on 10x smoother and spreads so much easier. Also cleans really well after use!

reviews.review_title: the best self-tan applicator out there!

reviews.review_text: I was so pleasantly surprised when this arrived. I purchased this one thinking it was the other more foamy applicator by St. Tropez that I like. But this one is more fabric-based and works even better! It has a much more luxurious feel than other more sponge-like applicators and spreads product out evenly. I'm sure a lot of product is lost in it, kind of like it would be with other applicators or beauty blenders but it's worth it for the even tan.

reviews.review_text: This mitt works really well. I got a good, even application with it. It washes easily after multiple uses and using DARK tanner. Also the double sided aspect is something I didnu2019t know I needed but I thoroughly enjoy.

reviews.review_title: Good tool for self-tanning, though a little small
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time using this type of mitt to apply self-tanner. In the past I've used latex gloves or spray-on products that don't require rubbing in. I was pleasantly surprised - it was easy to use and gave a smooth, streak-free tan, even when using a clear, un-tinted self-tanner.   My only complaint is that it is difficult to fit my entire hand into the glove; the heel of my hand and wrist remain exposed. If you have larger hands, you may want to look for a larger mitt, or be careful about getting tanner around your wrist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: No complaints with how this applies self tanner; it works great for a mitt. I do recommend wearing gloves underneath because it can leak through.  However my discovery is that medical, nitrile gloves honestly work better! They soak up NO product, so you don't have to use as much, and it protects your hands.
